text: Altes Amt Ebstorf is a former Samtgemeinde ("collective municipality") in Uelzen, in Lower Saxony, Germany. Its seat was in the village Ebstorf. At the 1 November 2011 local government reform, the collective municipality Bevensen and Altes Amt Ebstorf combined to form the new collective municipality Bevensen-Ebstorf. The collective municipality Altes Amt Ebstorf had the following municipalities: # Ebstorf # Hanstedt # Natendorf # Schwienau # Wriedel ==References== == Other websites == * (German) Category:Former Samtgemeinden in Lower Saxony
title: Altes Amt Ebstorf
